detail_desc: Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Long top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Coat in woven fabric with a gently rounded collar, concealed buttons down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs. Lined.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two of which are decorated with pendants. Adjustable length 40-48 cm.
T-shirt in soft, ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with flounces around the armholes, short, narrow shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathers at the top. Lined.
Playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a low-cut back, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Metal earrings with large, round pendants in metal and plastic. Length 9 cm.
Long, fitted jersey top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top and a zip fly and buttons. Side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.
Sandals with jute-covered wedge heels and narrow fabric straps that tie around the ankle and have a decorative tassel at the ends. Fabric insoles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Sandals in imitation leather with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Playsuit in soft viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Hat in a soft rib knit decorated with sequins. Sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Hoodie with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lightweight windbreaker in woven fabric with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Narrow ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a decorative knot detail at the front hem. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a round neckline.
Flared trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Long dress in softly draping chiffon with a deep V-neck decorated with a pleated flounce that continues over each shoulder and down the back where it turns into narrow ribbons that cross and tie. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a flared, pleated skirt. Satin lining.
Playsuit in an airy, patterned weave with an open back, wide, multiway shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with sewn-on ties. Lined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered, cropped sleeveless top in soft jersey with a sweetheart neckline, decorative knot at the front and seam under the bust.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset and a string back.
Platform sandals in imitation suede with an elasticated ankle strap and braided jute trims around the heels and soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 10 cm.
Straight-cut coat in a soft weave with notch lapels, a one-button fastening, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Round sunglasses with slim metal and plastic frames, adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Wide shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket at the front, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket and front and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a wide, elasticated neckline, short raglan sleeves with a frill trim, and elasticated hem.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Jersey-lined hood with a small collar and drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets and a mesh inner pocket, all with a hook and loop fastening. Narrow trims at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Jersey lining.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and yoke at the back. Pleats down the front, a detachable belt with metal D-rings at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Frill-trimmed wrapover top, lightly padded cups, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft viscose and cotton jersey with a wide lace flounce at the top.

Short skirt in soft, gently draping twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets with a flap, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Polo shirt in premium cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front and along one leg, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Gloves in a soft fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in semi-transparent jersey with long, wide sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Slides with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton blend with a tie. Lined.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with wide ribbing at the hems.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide legs with a flounce at the hems.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Top in cotton jersey with shoulder pads and short, wide sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.

Trousers in a silk and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Reinforced waistband, pleats at the waist and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut, gently draping legs.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. A-line dress in soft cotton velvet with a frilled collar, a small opening with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in woven fabric with rounded shoulders, buttons down the front, short sleeves, pleats at the waist and a flare to the hem.

Knee-length shirt dress in soft leather with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a wide, detachable belt to define the waist. Dropped shoulders, wide, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fitted top in cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim, and elbow-length sleeves.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and quilted imitation leather sections on the shoulders. Kangaroo pocket, diagonal side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft fleece with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Semi shiny stay-ups with a wide lace trim at the top and silicone on the inside. 20 denier.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Double-layered scarf in pile with an opening at one end for a simple way to fasten it around the neck.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Frill trim at the top and diagonal patch pockets at the front with decorative lace trims.

Hobo bag in soft imitation leather with a zip and handle at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Two zipped outer pockets. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 34 cm. Height 37 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap chest and front pockets with press-studs, and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Outdoor hat in breathable thermal fleece.
Jacket in a checked felted wool blend in a straight, slightly shorter style. Collar, zip down the front, two zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and long sleeves with a button at the cuffs. Lined.
